You huddle in your parka, but the cruel windpenetrates your body. You feel yourself growingnumb. You try to stand up, but your legs won'tmove. You feel as if you are drifting through timeand space. Then you feel nothing at all. The search and rescue team almost reachedyou in time. They were never able to locateLarsen and Sneed. A few days later a memorialservice was held for the brave people who losttheir lives exploring the Bottomless Crevasse. Ev-eryone spoke very highly of you.

The End
